name: Real Coin Pusher
description:
Welcome to Real Coin Pusher, where Twitch streaming meets the classic charm of arcade coin pushers! Immerse yourself and your viewers in an interactive gaming experience like never before. As the streamer, you become the host of the virtual arcade. Viewers do not need the game, only Streamers. The machine is designed to be a more realistic experience, without the parody nonsense.

Real Coin Pusher introduces a unique dynamic to your Twitch channel, allowing viewers to actively participate by dropping coins in the chat using the !drop command. Watch as the excitement unfolds, as viewers race to the top of the scoreboard.

Earn coins, drop coins. Use your coins to purchase unique coins that are in the stores only once! Real Coin Pusher isn't just a game, it's a community-building tool that adds a layer of interactivity to your content, making your channel an even more engaging destination for viewers. Take your Twitch streaming to the next level with Real Coin Pusher. Start the coin-pushing fun today and redefine the way you connect with your audience!
